summary: The module is a training script that demonstrates how to use a Heterogeneous Graph Transformer (HGT) model with PyTorch and DGL to perform node classification on the ACM academic citation network. It downloads the dataset, builds a heterogeneous graph, initializes the model, runs the training loop, and evaluates performance.
business_intent: Provide a reference implementation for applying graph neural networks to heterogeneous academic networks, enabling organizations to analyze citation graphs, recommend related research, or predict paper categories using deep learning.
